title: Wine Decanter With Stopper, 1864
provenance: This set was ordered by Emperor Francis Josef I for roughly 50 persons, to be used for very special dinners in the Hofburg only (1865-1890).
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Mouth-blown crystal, richly cut and polished with facets and leaf ornamentation

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Wine Decanter With Stopper, 1864.
1864. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-1-a,b.
